features.featureTitle: Replace or supplement the existing PWA install button (InstallButton.tsx) with a always-visible 'Download App' button in the app header that does not depend on the beforeinstallprompt event. When clicked, it should trigger a direct download of the PWA as a web app by: (1) still attempting the native browser install prompt if available via the existing usePWAInstall hook, and (2) as a fallback, showing a modal or tooltip with clear step-by-step instructions for manually installing the app on Chrome (Add to Home Screen via browser menu), Safari (Share â†’ Add to Home Screen), and other major browsers. The button must always be visible regardless of browser install prompt availability.
